      • reduceGeckoPriority

        public static void reduceGeckoPriority(long timeout)
        Reduces the priority of the Gecko thread, allowing other operations (such as those related to the UI and database) to take precedence. Note that there are no guards in place to prevent multiple calls to this method from conflicting with each other.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Timeout in ms after which the priority will be reset

      • resetGeckoPriority

        public static void resetGeckoPriority()
        Resets the priority of a thread whose priority has been reduced by reduceGeckoPriority.
